name: Crimson Hunters of the Terrace
description: Hailing from Odonaâ€™s Tears, the Crimson Hunters of the Terrace are known for their belief and allegiance to the semi-sentient forest, Amoria Now lying in boredom, hungering for war, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
